project_name: AWS Services Architecture Implementation Using Terraform
description: Implemented scalable AWS infrastructure using AWS Elastic Container Service (ECS), AWS Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2), Auto Scaling Groups (ASG) with GPU instances, and Application Load Balancers (ALB) for secure and efficient traffic management. Automated deployment with Terraform.

technologies_used.name: Terraform
technologies_used.description: Used for automating the setup of AWS infrastructure, including ECS services, Auto Scaling, Virtual Private Cloud (VPC), and Application Load Balancers (ALB).

technologies_used.name: AWS VPC & Subnets
technologies_used.description: Proficiency in configuring VPCs, subnets (public/private), and routing for secure network communications.

technologies_used.name: AWS ECS
technologies_used.description: Managed containerized applications across multiple ECS clusters.

technologies_used.name: AWS EC2
technologies_used.description: Provisioned EC2 instances with GPU for high-performance computing.

technologies_used.name: AWS Application Load Balancer (ALB)
technologies_used.description: Used for load balancing between services and ensuring secure HTTPS communication.

infrastructure.name: EC2 Auto Scaling Group with GPU Instances
infrastructure.description: Auto Scaling Group that uses GPU instances to handle traffic surges.
steps: Configured EC2 Auto Scaling Group with GPU instances.
Set scaling policies based on traffic load.

infrastructure.name: Application Load Balancers
infrastructure.description: Two load balancers to handle secure HTTPS communication and distribute load across services.
steps: Configured the first ALB for HTTPS communication between frontend and backend.
Set up the second ALB to manage other traffic.

infrastructure.name: Terraform Infrastructure as Code
infrastructure.description: Automated the entire infrastructure setup with Terraform.
steps: Used Terraform to configure ECS services, VPC, ALBs, and Auto Scaling Group.

skills_required.name: Terraform
skills_required.description: Proficiency in using Terraform to automate AWS infrastructure setup.

skills_required.name: AWS ECS
skills_required.description: Experience in deploying and managing containerized applications using ECS.

skills_required.name: EC2 Auto Scaling
skills_required.description: Configuring EC2 Auto Scaling Groups to dynamically scale based on traffic.

skills_required.name: AWS ALB
skills_required.description: Configuring AWS Application Load Balancers (ALBs) for load balancing and secure traffic management.

challenges_faced.name: Optimizing GPU Instance Usage
challenges_faced.description: Ensuring cost-efficiency by utilizing GPU instances during high traffic periods.

challenges_faced.name: Ensuring Secure Communication
challenges_faced.description: Configuring Application Load Balancers (ALBs) for HTTPS communication to enforce secure traffic.

outcomes.name: Scalable and Secure Infrastructure
outcomes.description: Deployed a scalable and secure AWS infrastructure that handled traffic efficiently.

outcomes.name: Automated Infrastructure Deployment
outcomes.description: Automated the entire infrastructure setup using Terraform, reducing manual intervention.
